reapack.name: lms_core.jsfx-inc
reapack.desc: LMS Core DSP Kernel — Shared library (required by all LMS plugins)

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — shared DSP kernel. All LMS plugins import this. Contains: tanh/dB math, stereo biquad filters (HP/LP/BP/peak/shelf), saturation suite (warm/hot/tape/rect/fuzz/harmonics), FET compressor, DC blocker, tone filter, cubic interpolation, spring reverb allpass.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.0 — Density-aware amp ecosystem support. Core kernel now used by Frenchie v2 (Champ), Punk Idol v2 (JCM800), The Fridge v2 (SVT), Top Boost v2 (AC15), and The TRSOB v2 (Mesa Triple Rectifier) density-aware amp sims with built-in effects (spring reverb, tremolo, tape echo, Crushinator).

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v3.0 — Density-aware saturation replaces ADAA waveshaper. All 5 sat modes (warm/hot/tape/rect/fuzz) now use same triode architecture as v2 amp sims: coupling cap bias shift, 4-band density tracker (Lo/Mid/Hi/Air), density-driven drive boost, grid conduction (peak envelope gated soft clamp), Miller LP (density-driven cutoff), air shelf (density-driven HF), DC blocker. Fixes crash on load in tube sat and all plugins using sat functions (uninitialized ADAA state caused spike on first sample). Added mono lms_bq_proc to biquad section.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v3.1 — Removed 926 lines of dead legacy code: ADAA triode stages, EL34/6L6 power amps, Marshall/Mesa tone stacks and cabinet sims, sag simulator, opto compressor, cascaded saturation, ADAA antiderivative primitives. All superseded by density-aware v2 amp sims. Core is now 720 clean lines.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v3.2 — Fix: lms_gfx_notice() forward-declaration error (moved above lms_gfx_notice_btn). GUI helpers section added.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v4.0 — Section 12: Pitch Detection & Correction. YIN pitch detector (lms_yin_init/write/detect — monophonic vocal pitch tracking with cumulative mean normalized difference, parabolic interpolation, built-in confidence). Dual-tap pitch shifter (lms_pshift_init/proc — sin^2 crossfaded variable delay for click-free pitch shifting, uses lms_interp_cubic). Scale snap helper (lms_snap_to_scale — bitmask-based scale lookup). Scale mask constants (LMS_SCALE_CHROMATIC/MAJOR/MINOR). Powers the new LMS Pitch Detector and LMS Autotune plugins.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v4.1 — Opto density tracker (lms_opto_hd_init/proc) exposed as standalone 4-band voiced/unvoiced classifier for pitch detection intelligence. Used by both LMS Pitch Detector and LMS Autotune for density-gated YIN decimation. No API changes to existing functions.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v5.0 — Section 13: Cabinet Simulation. 7 real-world cabinet models (1x12 Greenback, 1x12 Jensen C12N, 1x12 Alnico Blue, 2x12 Jensen, 4x12 G12T-75, 4x12 V30, 8x10 SVT Sealed) as shared table-driven presets — any amp can load any cab. Density-aware speaker breakup: bandpass-extracted cone breakup band → envelope follower → density-scaled tanh saturation mixed as parallel harmonics. Dynamic LP darkens top end under load (real cone stiffening). Dynamic resonance excites cabinet body proportional to excursion. Mic position simulation: off-axis hi-shelf rolloff + proximity effect bass reversal. GUI: clickable cab selector widget (lms_draw_cab_sel), chromatic tuner strip (lms_draw_tuner — note name, cents meter with color-coded accuracy, frequency readout). All 6 density-aware amp sims now share the cab system.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v5.1 — 5 new cabinet presets: Sheffield 1x15 Open (open-back bass cab, 45Hz tuning, warm LP at 4kHz), 4x10 Sealed (Orange OBC410 bass cab, 50Hz HP, 90Hz resonance, tight 4.5kHz LP), Orange PPC412 (closed-back 4x12 V30, 1.5kHz bark peak, 110Hz resonance — THE Orange sound). Also added 1x15 Open preset. CAB_PRESET_COUNT now 12. All existing amp sims updated with expanded cab selector (12 cabinets).

reapack.desc: LMS RTW — LMS Reinvents The Wheel (Channel Strip)

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.0 — Full GUI overhaul with skeuomorphic analog controls, broadcast system (gmem instance registry, follow mode, state stealing), persistent follow state across transport stop/start.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.1 — Renamed to LMS RTW (LMS Reinvents The Wheel).

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v3.0 — Fix: GUI slider changes now update audio in real-time (slider_automate). Hidden native slider panel.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v4.0 — Shared DSP kernel (import lms_core.jsfx-inc): one file contains all biquad filters, saturation, compressor, DC blocker — fix once, every plugin gets better. Broadcast system: BC_MAX_INST 8→32 so sessions with 30+ tracks work correctly. Instance panel paging: 5 rows/page with < > navigation, defaults to your page, YOU button to jump back. Status labels: LEADER (gold, someone following you) / FOLLOWER (blue, you are following) / UNASSIGNED (gray, free agent) — replaces the always-on [LEADER] label.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v4.1 — Saturation now density-aware (core v3.0). Instance prefix + _init fix.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v5.0 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

reapack.name: lms_frenchie_v2.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - The Frenchie v2 — Density-Aware Champ Amp Sim

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware Fender Champ 5F1 amp sim. Two triode stages (V1a 12AX7 preamp + V2b power driver) with fixed asymmetric clipping and 4-band density tracker (Lo/Mid/Hi/Air) driving Miller LP, air shelf, drive boost, and NFB bandwidth — NOT the clipping curve. PSU sag (25% max droop, 80ms recovery). Simple tone control (LP sweep). 1x12 Greenback cab sim. Built-in spring reverb (4-stage allpass diffusion, pre-delay, feedback LP) and bias tremolo (sine LFO, 1-10Hz). Runs 16 instances at 2.5% CPU.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Six Champ 5F1 circuit additions from real schematic: (1) 5Y3 tube rectifier PSU — upgraded to 5ms attack, 200ms recovery, 30% max droop (one of the saggiest rectifiers ever, notes "bloom" as supply recovers). (2) Single-ended 6V6 Class A power amp — replaces V2b triode with proper SE power amp: single tube asymmetric clipping (positive plate-current limiting, negative gradual cutoff), even harmonics preserved (no push-pull cancellation), cathode bias shift (5ms/150ms, up to 20% gain reduction). (3) Output transformer saturation — tiny 5W Champ OT saturates earliest in the suite (×4.0 sensitivity at ~80Hz), density-driven low-frequency core loading creates the fat compressed Champ sound. (4) Transformer winding resonance — 3.5kHz +2.5dB peak (the Champ "sparkle"). (5) RF input filter — 68kΩ grid stopper LP at 10kHz (the soft Champ input feel). (6) Open-back cab resonance — 90Hz +2.0dB Q=2.5 (1x12 baffle resonance). Monitor updated with 6V6 density, transformer core load %, cathode bias shift %, and B+ voltage.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.2 — Full suite-standard GUI: interactive slider controls (draw_bar with click-drag and slider_automate), broadcast system (BC_MY_TYPE=11, gmem instance registry, follow/steal/leader/follower modes, 32 instances), instance manager panel with pagination, NOTICE overlay with usage docs, @serialize for persistent follow state. 560×420 two-column layout (Preamp + Effects). All controls now match the LMS channel strip / tube sat / tape machine GUI standard.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.3 — Fix: spring reverb buffer collision with broadcast system (buf_base 100000 overlapped BC_BASE 100000). Reverb would go haywire to infinity after ~30 seconds. Moved spring reverb buffer to address 50000.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.4 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.0 — Shared cabinet simulation: replaced hardcoded 1x12 Greenback cab EQ with core Section 13 cab system. 7 selectable cabinets (Off, 1x12 Greenback, 1x12 Jensen, 1x12 Blue, 2x12 Jensen, 4x12 G12T-75, 4x12 V30, 8x10 Sealed). Density-aware speaker breakup, dynamic LP darkening, dynamic cabinet resonance, mic distance (off-axis rolloff + proximity effect). Built-in chromatic tuner strip (YIN pitch detector on dry input). Cabinet panel in GUI with selector, on/off toggle, mic distance slider. Cab params broadcast through gmem (follow/steal). BC_PARAM_COUNT bumped to 14.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.1 — Expanded cab selector: 12 cabinets (added 1x15 Open, 4x10 Sealed, Orange PPC412). Core v5.1.

reapack.name: lms_punk_v2.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - Punk Idol v2 — Density-Aware JCM800 Amp Sim

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware Marshall JCM800 2203 amp sim. Dual triode stages (V1B crunch + V1A lead) with fixed asymmetric clipping and 4-band density tracker driving Miller LP, air shelf, drive boost, and NFB bandwidth. EL34 push-pull power amp (asymmetric 1.4x/1.35x hardness). PSU sag with tube rectifier response. Clean/Crunch/Lead switching. Full passive tone stack (bass/mid/treble/presence). 4x12 Greenback cab sim. Built-in spring reverb, bias tremolo, and tape echo (circular delay with LP feedback, wow/flutter). Runs 16 instances at 2.5% CPU.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Six JCM800 circuit additions from real 2203/2204 schematic: (1) Bright cap — 120pF gain-dependent treble boost at 3kHz, preserves pick attack at low gain, swamped at high gain. (2) Cathode follower — 12AX7 unity-gain buffer between preamp and tone stack, programme-dependent compression (up to 20% gain reduction), prevents tone stack loading. (3) Long-tail pair phase inverter — 12AX7 LTP driving EL34 grids, soft round clipping at high master adds "pillow" pre-compression before power tubes. (4) Output transformer saturation — density-driven low-frequency core loading at ~120Hz, saturates lows only on big power chords (smaller core than SVT = more sensitive). (5) Presence in NFB loop — presence control adjusts HF content of negative feedback loop (more presence = less HF NFB = more bite). (6) Cab resonance — 110Hz closed-back 4x12 air resonance (Q=3.0). Monitor updated with PI density, transformer core load, and CF compression readouts.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.2 — Full suite-standard GUI: interactive slider controls (draw_bar with click-drag and slider_automate), broadcast system (BC_MY_TYPE=12, gmem instance registry, follow/steal/leader/follower modes, 32 instances), instance manager panel with pagination, NOTICE overlay with usage docs, @serialize for persistent follow state. 600×480 three-column layout (Preamp + Tone/Power + Effects). Channel mode selector (Clean/Crunch/Lead). All controls now match the LMS suite GUI standard.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.3 — Fix: spring reverb buffer collision with broadcast system (buf_base 100000 overlapped BC_BASE 100000). Reverb would go haywire to infinity after ~30 seconds. Moved spring reverb buffer to address 50000.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.4 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.0 — Shared cabinet simulation: replaced hardcoded 4x12 Greenback cab EQ with core Section 13 cab system. 7 selectable cabinets (Off, 1x12 Greenback, 1x12 Jensen, 1x12 Blue, 2x12 Jensen, 4x12 G12T-75, 4x12 V30, 8x10 Sealed). Density-aware speaker breakup, dynamic LP darkening, dynamic cabinet resonance, mic distance (off-axis rolloff + proximity effect). Built-in chromatic tuner strip (YIN pitch detector on dry input). Cabinet panel in GUI with selector, on/off toggle, mic distance slider. Cab params broadcast through gmem (follow/steal). BC_PARAM_COUNT bumped to 18.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.1 — Expanded cab selector: 12 cabinets (added 1x15 Open, 4x10 Sealed, Orange PPC412). Core v5.1.

reapack.name: lms_fridge_v2.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - The Fridge v2 — Density-Aware SVT Bass Amp Sim

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware Ampeg SVT-CL bass amp sim. Single V1 12AX7 preamp with even harmonic emphasis (neg clips softer), 6550 push-pull power amp (symmetric 1.2x, high headroom). Bass-tuned 4-band density tracker (Lo<150Hz, Mid 150-1200Hz, Hi>1200Hz, Air>3500Hz). SVT tone stack with selectable mid freq (220/450/800/1.6k/3k), Ultra Lo/Hi switches. 8x10 sealed cab sim (6-band). Built-in Crushinator pedal (SansAmp-style parallel clean/dirty blend with diode clipping, pre-clip presence/mid push, post-clip bass/treble EQ). Tape echo. Runs 16 instances at 2.5% CPU.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Full SVT-CL circuit modeling: V1b recovery stage (low-gain even-harmonic buffer between V1a and tone stack), 12AU7 phase inverter/driver (pillow overdrive at high master), output transformer low-frequency saturation (THE GROWL — density-driven core loading saturates lows only, even harmonics on big bass notes), RF input filter (12kHz LP removes ultrasonic content that aliases through gain stages), mid frequency Q variation (220Hz=wide shelf-like, 3kHz=narrow surgical — matches real SVT component impedances), sealed box 60Hz resonance (chest punch). All using existing density-aware architecture. ~0.3% additional CPU per instance.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.2 — Full suite-standard GUI: interactive slider controls (draw_bar with click-drag and slider_automate), broadcast system (BC_MY_TYPE=13, gmem instance registry, follow/steal/leader/follower modes, 32 instances), instance manager panel with pagination, NOTICE overlay with usage docs, @serialize for persistent follow state. 640×520 three-column layout (Preamp + Tone/Power + Effects). Mid Freq 5-way mode selector, Ultra Lo/Hi toggles, Crushinator toggle with Drive/Blend/Presence/Low/High controls. All controls now match the LMS suite GUI standard.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.3 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.0 — Shared cabinet simulation: replaced hardcoded 8x10 sealed cab EQ with core Section 13 cab system. 7 selectable cabinets (Off, 1x12 Greenback, 1x12 Jensen, 1x12 Blue, 2x12 Jensen, 4x12 G12T-75, 4x12 V30, 8x10 Sealed). Density-aware speaker breakup, dynamic LP darkening, dynamic cabinet resonance, mic distance (off-axis rolloff + proximity effect). Built-in chromatic tuner strip (YIN pitch detector on dry input). Cabinet panel in GUI with selector, on/off toggle, mic distance slider. Cab params broadcast through gmem (follow/steal).

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.1 — Expanded cab selector: 12 cabinets (added 1x15 Open, 4x10 Sealed, Orange PPC412). Core v5.1.

reapack.name: lms_ac15_v2.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - Top Boost v2 — Density-Aware AC15 Amp Sim

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware Vox AC15 amp sim. EF86 pentode preamp (soft positive/HARD negative cutoff — the AC15 "glass") with 12AX7 second stage on Top Boost channel. EL84 cathode-biased push-pull power amp with NO negative feedback (raw, alive, touch-sensitive), cathode bias shift for natural compression. Top Boost EQ with built-in mid presence peak (the chime). Tone Cut (back panel LP). Celestion Alnico Blue 1x12 cab sim with 2.5kHz presence peak. Built-in bias tremolo and spring reverb. Normal/Top Boost channel switching. 20% PSU sag with spongy feel.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Six AC15 circuit additions from real schematic: (1) Cathodyne phase inverter — real AC15 uses cathodyne (concertina), NOT long-tail pair like Marshall. Wider bandwidth = more HF (Vox shimmer). Plate clips harder than cathode (asymmetric bloom under drive). (2) Output transformer saturation — small 15W EL84 OT (×3.5 sensitivity at ~90Hz), density-driven low-frequency core loading creates creamy breakup on power chords. (3) Transformer winding resonance — 4kHz +2.0dB peak (the Vox shimmer, between Champ 3.5k and Mesa 4.5k). (4) Interstage coupling cap HP at 160Hz — real AC15 has SMALLER coupling caps than Marshall (0.01µF vs 0.022µF), tighter bass than you'd expect from a Vox. (5) EF86 screen grid compression — pentode-specific positive peak soft knee, screen grid current limits positive peaks creating the "glassy" EF86 ceiling that's different from triode grid conduction. (6) Open-back cab resonance — 180Hz +1.5dB Q=2.0 (the "body" of the Vox sound). Monitor updated with cathodyne PI density, transformer core load %, and EF86 screen compression.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.2 — Full suite-standard GUI: interactive slider controls (draw_bar with click-drag and slider_automate), broadcast system (BC_MY_TYPE=14, gmem instance registry, follow/steal/leader/follower modes, 32 instances), instance manager panel with pagination, NOTICE overlay with usage docs, @serialize for persistent follow state. 600×460 three-column layout (Preamp + Tone/Power + Effects). Normal/Top Boost channel mode selector with Tone Cut control. All controls now match the LMS suite GUI standard.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.3 — Fix: spring reverb buffer collision with broadcast system (buf_base 100000 overlapped BC_BASE 100000). Reverb would go haywire to infinity after ~30 seconds. Moved spring reverb buffer to address 50000.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.4 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.0 — Shared cabinet simulation: replaced hardcoded 1x12 Alnico Blue cab EQ with core Section 13 cab system. 7 selectable cabinets (Off, 1x12 Greenback, 1x12 Jensen, 1x12 Blue, 2x12 Jensen, 4x12 G12T-75, 4x12 V30, 8x10 Sealed). Density-aware speaker breakup, dynamic LP darkening, dynamic cabinet resonance, mic distance (off-axis rolloff + proximity effect). Built-in chromatic tuner strip (YIN pitch detector on dry input). Cabinet panel in GUI with selector, on/off toggle, mic distance slider. Cab params broadcast through gmem (follow/steal). BC_PARAM_COUNT bumped to 18.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.1 — Expanded cab selector: 12 cabinets (added 1x15 Open, 4x10 Sealed, Orange PPC412). Core v5.1.

reapack.name: lms_twins_v2.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - The Twins v2 — Density-Aware Fender Twin/Deluxe Amp Sim

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware Fender Twin Reverb / Deluxe Reverb amp sim. Two amps in one plugin: Twin Reverb (85W, 6L6GC push-pull, silicon rectifier, 2×12 open-back Jensen C12N) and Deluxe Reverb (22W, 6V6GT push-pull, 5U4GB tube rectifier, 1×12 open-back Jensen C12N). Shared AB763 preamp: V1a 12AX7 (fully bypassed cathode), cathode follower buffer (V1b, prevents tone stack loading, 18% programme-dependent compression), Fender passive tone stack (700Hz mid — THE scooped Fender sound), 12AT7 LTP phase inverter (lower gain than Marshall's 12AX7 = more headroom = stays clean longer). Gain-dependent bright cap (120pF, 3.5kHz). RF input filter (68k grid stopper). Twin: 6L6GC push-pull with minimal cathode bias shift (8%), 85W output transformer (×1.8 sensitivity — hardest to saturate in suite), 3.8kHz winding resonance, 10dB NFB with presence. Deluxe: 6V6GT push-pull with 15% cathode bias shift (more compression), 22W output transformer (×3.0 sensitivity — saturates earlier = warmer breakup), 3.5kHz winding resonance, 8dB NFB with presence. Fender 3-spring reverb tank (brighter, more diffuse than single-spring). Bias tremolo. Tape echo. Full monitor with per-channel power amp density, transformer core load, cathode bias, and B+ voltage.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Full suite-standard GUI: interactive slider controls (draw_bar with click-drag and slider_automate), broadcast system (BC_MY_TYPE=16, gmem instance registry, follow/steal/leader/follower modes, 32 instances), instance manager panel with pagination, NOTICE overlay with usage docs, @serialize for persistent follow state. 600×480 three-column layout (Preamp + Tone/Power + Effects). Twin (85W) / Deluxe (22W) channel mode selector with channel-dependent power amp switching. All controls now match the LMS suite GUI standard.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.2 — Fix: spring reverb buffer collision with broadcast system (buf_base 100000 overlapped BC_BASE 100000). Reverb would go haywire to infinity after ~30 seconds. Moved spring reverb buffer to address 50000.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.3 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.0 — Shared cabinet simulation: replaced hardcoded 2x12 Jensen cab EQ with core Section 13 cab system. 7 selectable cabinets (Off, 1x12 Greenback, 1x12 Jensen, 1x12 Blue, 2x12 Jensen, 4x12 G12T-75, 4x12 V30, 8x10 Sealed). Density-aware speaker breakup, dynamic LP darkening, dynamic cabinet resonance, mic distance (off-axis rolloff + proximity effect). Built-in chromatic tuner strip (YIN pitch detector on dry input). Cabinet panel in GUI with selector, on/off toggle, mic distance slider. Cab params broadcast through gmem (follow/steal). Twin/Deluxe channel selector now also switches default cab (2x12 Jensen for Twin, 1x12 Jensen for Deluxe).

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.1 — Expanded cab selector: 12 cabinets (added 1x15 Open, 4x10 Sealed, Orange PPC412). Core v5.1.

reapack.name: lms_mesa_v2.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - The TRSOB v2 — Density-Aware Triple Rectifier Amp Sim

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware Mesa Boogie Triple Rectifier amp sim. Three channels: Clean (V1a only, Fender-like breakup), Vintage (V1a→V2a→V2b, creamy singing lead), Modern (V1a→V2a→V2b driven HARD, wall of brown crushing chug). V2b cold-bias stage with extreme asymmetry (pos_hard=2.0, neg_hard=0.7) for massive 2nd harmonics — THE Mesa sound. V2a partially bypassed cathode with 86Hz HP (0.68uF/2.7k) — THE tightness mechanism, 12dB less gain below 86Hz prevents low-end mud through cascaded stages. Interstage coupling cap HP at 72Hz (3× cascaded = ultra-tight at max gain). Cathode follower (programme-dependent compression up to 30% gain reduction). 6L6 push-pull power amp with output transformer saturation and winding resonance (4.5kHz). Silicon/Tube rectifier × Bold/Spongy PSU matrix (4 distinct dynamics from tightest to saggiest). Mesa passive tone stack (mid at 750Hz). Gain-dependent bright cap (2kHz). V30 4x12 closed-back cab with 8-stage EQ and 120Hz box resonance. Built-in noise gate and tape echo. Full monitor with per-stage density, B+ voltage, CF compression, xfmr load.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Full suite-standard GUI: interactive slider controls (draw_bar with click-drag and slider_automate), broadcast system (BC_MY_TYPE=15, gmem instance registry, follow/steal/leader/follower modes, 32 instances), instance manager panel with pagination, NOTICE overlay with usage docs, @serialize for persistent follow state. 600×480 three-column layout (Preamp + Tone/Power + Effects). Channel mode selector (Clean/Vintage/Modern), Rectifier toggle (Silicon/Tube), Bold/Spongy toggle, Noise Gate toggle. All controls now match the LMS suite GUI standard.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.2 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.0 — Shared cabinet simulation: replaced hardcoded 4x12 V30 closed-back cab EQ with core Section 13 cab system. 7 selectable cabinets (Off, 1x12 Greenback, 1x12 Jensen, 1x12 Blue, 2x12 Jensen, 4x12 G12T-75, 4x12 V30, 8x10 Sealed). Density-aware speaker breakup, dynamic LP darkening, dynamic cabinet resonance, mic distance (off-axis rolloff + proximity effect). Built-in chromatic tuner strip (YIN pitch detector on dry input). Cabinet panel in GUI with selector, on/off toggle, mic distance slider. Cab params broadcast through gmem (follow/steal).

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.1 — Expanded cab selector: 12 cabinets (added 1x15 Open, 4x10 Sealed, Orange PPC412). Core v5.1.

reapack.name: lms_density_limiter.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - Density Maximizer — Auto-Makeup Brick-Wall Limiter

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware master bus limiter. Reads harmonic density state from LMS amp plugins via gmem to predict peaks BEFORE they arrive. Gain reduction is proactive, not reactive — the signal never clips because the limiter already set the gain correctly. True peak detection with inter-sample peak interpolation. Soft knee with 3dB width. Tanh soft clip safety net. GR meter, density state display, measured vs predicted peak comparison. Works standalone (standard reactive limiting) or gmem-linked (predictive mode).

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v0.2 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.0 — Renamed to Density Maximizer. Auto-makeup gain, brick-wall limiting, density-aware threshold modulation. Full rewrite of gain staging and metering.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Add Pop, Hardcore, Hip-Hop, Punk EQ profiles (8 total). Genre-targeted reactive EQ curves with dedicated filter coefficients.

reapack.name: lms_density_seq.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - Density Sequencer — Your Playing Is The Sequence

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-reactive sequencer/instrument. Reads density state from any LMS amp plugin via gmem and generates rhythmic/melodic output driven by the harmonic content of your playing. Four modes: Drums (lo→kick, mid→snare, hi→hats, air→cymbals), Bass Synth (scale-quantized bass from density), Arp (density-driven arpeggiation with direction/range modulation), Drone (two oscillators with density-reactive filter and volume). Scale selection (minor/major pent, minor/major, chromatic), root note, swing, humanize. Pattern memory grid shows last 16 steps as density-colored cells. Built-in synth engine with 10 voices.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v0.2 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

reapack.name: lms_la2a.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - Silver Sixty Nine — Density-Aware Opto Compressor

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware opto compressor inspired by the LA-2A. T4 opto cell with dual light-dependent resistor model (fast/slow time constants), program-dependent attack/release, density-aware threshold modulation, peak/compress mode, mix (parallel compression), HF emphasis sidechain, GR metering, broadcast follow/steal.

reapack.name: lms_smart_gate.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - Smart Gate — Density-Aware Noise Gate

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware noise gate with two modes: Single (per-track gating with density-adaptive threshold) and Drum (cross-mic spatial inference for bleed rejection). Smooth S-curve gain transitions, look-ahead transient preservation, density-modulated hold time, per-band analysis, broadcast follow/steal.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.0 — Cross-instance drum command center. Remote threshold adjustment: right-click any peer row to adjust that drum's gate threshold from current instance. Phase correction system: OH (Overheads) drum type with independent gating, one-hit calibration measures sample-accurate offset between close mics and overheads, stereo OH averaging, persistent offset via serialize, CLR to reset. OH instances get CAL ALL button to arm every close mic simultaneously. Phase View: live visualization overlay with wobbling circles per close mic — red/wobbly when out of phase, green/smooth when aligned. Peer panel phase indicators (green dot = corrected). Plugin delay compensation for phase correction delay.

reapack.name: lms_pitch_detector.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - Pitch Detector — YIN Vocal Pitch Tracker + MIDI Output

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — YIN pitch detection algorithm for monophonic vocals (80Hz-1kHz). Publishes detected frequency, confidence, MIDI note, and cents offset to shared pitch bus (gmem 950000). MIDI note-on/off output for vocoder and synth triggering. Adjustable sensitivity threshold, frequency range, and MIDI channel. Real-time pitch display with note name, cents meter, and confidence bar. Broadcast follow/steal.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.0 — Vocal Intelligence upgrade. 4-band density tracker for voiced/unvoiced classification (skips YIN when unvoiced, ~60% CPU savings on speech). YIN decimation gate (skip redundant detections when locked on confident note). Pitch velocity tracking (semitones/sec, smoothed). Onset detection (3dB rise threshold for note attacks). Vibrato detection (ring buffer zero-crossing rate + depth estimation, 3-12Hz). Auto-ranging (learns singer's frequency range, narrows YIN search bounds with asymmetric smoothing). Publishes all intelligence data to pitch bus slots 8-15. Fixed voiced threshold for reliable detection across input levels. Safety net: YIN runs every 4th block even when unvoiced to prevent stale lockups.

reapack.name: lms_autotune.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - Autotune — Intelligent Pitch Correction

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Real-time pitch correction reading from LMS Pitch Detector via shared memory (zero detection overhead). Dual-tap variable delay with sin^2 crossfade for click-free pitch shifting. Speed control: 0% = bypass, 50% = smooth natural correction, 100% = hard tune (T-Pain). Key selection (C-B) with Chromatic, Major, and Minor scale modes. Bitmask scale snapping. Dry/wet mix. Output gain. IN/OUT pitch display with correction amount visualization. Broadcast follow/steal.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v2.0 — Embedded pitch detection + Vocal Intelligence. No longer requires standalone pitch detector — detects and corrects in one plugin. Full YIN detector with 4-band density tracker, voiced/unvoiced classification, YIN decimation, auto-ranging. Lookahead buffer (0-15ms) lets detection results arrive before audio hits the pitch shifter for cleaner note transitions. Signal conditioning: input HPF (80Hz), output DC blocker, tone filter (16kHz). Velocity-aware speed modulation (backs off during fast transitions). Onset snap (tighter correction on note attacks). Vibrato preservation (reduces correction during detected vibrato). Pitch Tendencies: per-note bias tracking learns singer's pitch habits (auto-locks after 10 observations per note), right-click bias editor for manual adjustment, LOCK/RESET buttons. Dry/wet as ratio fold (eliminates comb filtering). Compact PSOLA buffer (1024 samples, ~10ms delay). Still publishes to gmem pitch bus for vocoder compatibility. Serialization v2 with backward compat.

reapack.name: lms_drum_trigger.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - Drum Trigger — Audio-to-DrumBanger Transient Detector

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — 4-band transient detector that triggers DrumBanger pads from audio input. Per-band threshold/velocity/pad assignment, gmem direct sync to DrumBanger (no MIDI routing needed), DrumBanger heartbeat detection with LINKED/NOT SYNCED status display, MIDI output fallback.

reapack.name: lms_frenchie_dev.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - The Frenchie v3 — Density-Aware Champ (Full Hog)

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Frenchie v3 Full Hog. Everything from v2 plus: screen grid current (6V6 plate compression feeding back to PSU), 120Hz PSU ripple (scales with load), transformer core hysteresis (B-H memory blended at 5% on v2 saturation), speaker impedance interaction (80Hz resonance + voice coil + back-EMF), improved 5F1 tone circuit (source impedance mid-bump at 800Hz). All stages connected through shared power rail. 0.3% CPU.

reapack.name: lms_moog_synth.jsfx
reapack.desc: NUUG 420 — Analog Mono Synth w/ Ladder Filter

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Moog-inspired mono synth with PolyBLEP oscillators, 4-pole Moog ladder filter (LP/HP/BP), 2 ADSR envelopes, LFO with 6 shapes, up to 8-voice unison, glide/portamento, tube/tape/fuzz saturation, chorus, ping-pong delay, 11 built-in presets, category-based randomizer, DrumBanger pad trigger integration via gmem. Full GUI with waveform scope.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — GUI overhaul with skeuomorphic analog controls, in-plugin NOTICE button with full usage documentation.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.2 — Renamed to NUUG 420.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.3 — Shared DSP kernel, BC_MAX_INST 32, instance panel paging, LEADER/FOLLOWER/UNASSIGNED status labels.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.4 — Saturation now density-aware (core v3.0). Instance prefix + _init fix.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.5 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

reapack.name: lms_5150_v2.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - Area 50/51 v2 — Density-Aware Cold-Bias 6L6 Amp Sim

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware EVH 5150/6505 amp sim. High-gain cold-bias 6L6 architecture. Two channels: Rhythm (tight crunch, moderate gain) and Lead (cascaded stages, saturated high-gain). Cold-biased power tubes (Class AB running cold — crossover notch distortion at low volumes, aggressive bite). 4-stage 12AX7 preamp with bright cap. Shared post-EQ, resonance, presence controls. 6L6 push-pull power amp. Built-in noise gate, spring reverb, tape echo. 12 selectable cabinets. Full density monitor.

reapack.name: lms_basswoman_v2.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - The Basswoman v2 — Density-Aware Fender Bassman Amp Sim

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware Fender Bassman 5F6-A amp sim. Two channels: Normal (warm, full) and Bright (treble-boosted with bright cap). 12AY7 first preamp stage (38% of 12AX7 gain — the original low-gain Bassman input), 12AX7 second stage, 12AX7 phase inverter (more drive than Twin's 12AT7). Single 6L6 push-pull power amp: 50W, cathode-biased (14% shift — more compression than fixed bias), 5U4 tube rectifier (22% max droop, 4ms attack, 150ms recovery — one of the saggiest vintage rectifiers). Bassman tone stack: 40-170Hz bass sweep, 600Hz mid, ±6dB scoop (less scooped than Twin = more midrange body). Transformer resonance at 3.2kHz. Low NFB (6dB — raw, alive, touch-sensitive). Default cab: 1x15 Open (open-back bass cab). 12 selectable cabinets. Built-in spring reverb, bias tremolo, tape echo. Full density monitor with B+ voltage, cathode bias, transformer load.

reapack.name: lms_nightmare_v2.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - The Fucking Nightmare v2 — Density-Aware Terror Bass Amp Sim

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware Orange Terror Bass amp sim. Hybrid architecture: all-tube 12AX7 preamp with Class D solid-state power amp. Two channels: Warm (2-stage, clean to mild breakup) and Aggressive (4-stage cascaded, heavy saturation). NO bright cap (flat volume taper — key Orange characteristic). Orange FMV tone stack: bass-shifted (35-160Hz), 500Hz mid with ±5dB scoop (less mid-scoop than Marshall = mid-forward Orange voice), treble 800-3500Hz. Class D power section: transparent below clipping, hard symmetric clip at rails, no sag, no transformer saturation, no output transformer coloration — all the tone comes from the tube preamp. PSU sag affects preamp tubes only (10% max droop). Default cab: 4x10 Sealed (Orange OBC410 bass cab). 12 selectable cabinets. Built-in spring reverb, tape echo. Full density monitor.

reapack.name: lms_oj99_v2.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - OJ 99 v2 — Density-Aware Orange OR100 Amp Sim

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware Orange OR100 amp sim. All-tube, all common-cathode gain stages (no cold clipper — more symmetric clipping than Marshall). Two channels: Clean (2-stage, chimey cleans to edge-of-breakup) and Dirty (4-stage cascaded, thick saturated crunch to full roar). NO bright cap, NO cathode follower before tone stack, NO presence control — three key Orange design decisions that define the voice. High source impedance drives the tone stack differently (more interaction between controls). Orange FMV tone stack: 39k slope resistor (between Marshall 33k and Fender 56k), 700Hz mid, ±5dB scoop, treble 900-4000Hz. 4×EL34 push-pull power amp: fixed bias running hot, softer clipping than Marshall (push 1.35/pull 1.30), 12% cathode shift. Low NFB (~6dB — less than Marshall, more than none). Transformer resonance at 3.0kHz (warmer than Marshall). PSU: 20% max droop, 2ms attack, 100ms recovery (more sag than Marshall = more "alive" feel). Default cab: Orange PPC412 (closed-back 4x12 with V30s, 1.5kHz bark peak). 12 selectable cabinets. Built-in spring reverb, tape echo. Full density monitor with B+ voltage, cathode bias, transformer load.

reapack.name: lms_reverb.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS - Density Reverb — Harmonic Room Physics

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Density-aware algorithmic reverb with harmonic room physics. 8-line Hadamard FDN with 5 density-driven room behaviors: Air Absorption (HF dies faster with dense content — real air physics), Modal Resonance (bass density excites standing waves at calculated room-mode frequencies), Surface Saturation (walls buzz under density pressure via tanh), Diffusion Density (complex midrange gets denser echo wash), Decay Breathing (dense content shortens tail, sparse lets it extend). Local 4-band density tracker (Lo/Mid/Hi/Air). 12-tap early reflections with density-modulated per-tap absorption. 4-stage Dattorro input diffusion. 8 built-in presets: Plate, Spring, Pop Ambient, Basement, Studio Live, Studio Dampened, Cathedral, Garage. Room Size, Decay, Tone, Pre-Delay, Diffusion, Density Drive (0%=static room, 100%=fully reactive), Width, Mix, Low Cut, Output Gain. Room Physics density monitor showing Lo→Modes, Mid→Diffuse, Hi→Walls, Air→Absorb. Broadcast system (follow/steal). Works standalone or after any LMS amp sim.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Major sound quality overhaul. Fixed coherent FDN input (was a delay, not a reverb): input scaled to 1/sqrt(8) with alternating polarity. Two-stage cascaded LP in feedback path — the room's "Miller filter" (-12dB/oct air absorption). Inline allpass input diffusion with proper delay lengths. Output diffusion (2 allpass stages per channel). Modal resonance moved from feedback loop to output path (no more pitched drone). Stronger damping range, higher diffusion coefficients, gentler saturation.

reapack.name: lms_drumbanger.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS DRUMBANGER - 16-Pad Drum Machine

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — 16-pad drum sampler with multi-bar step sequencer, per-step velocity, sample pool, bus filters, compressor, gmem broadcast for drone satellites, adjustable MIDI root note, silent phantom pads, on-the-fly sampling. Includes two starter kits (808 + LoFi) from 99Sounds.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.2 — Daddy/Bootlicker pad link groups (D triggers all B pads in same group), choke groups (pads cut each other off like hi-hats), step ties (sustain notes across steps without retriggering), Ctrl+click pad copy (snapshot all settings + pattern to another pad), autofill across all bars, service-not-running warning, in-plugin NOTICE with full usage docs.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.3 — 4K/HiDPI scaling, shakebot logo, pool/kit merge (kits are now subfolders in pool/). Hidden kit slider (use GFX selector), removed octave buttons.

reapack.name: DrumbangerDroneMIDI2.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS Drone Satellite for DRUMBANGER

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Drone satellite with follow/lock modes, scale mapping, live trigger passthrough.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Added in-plugin NOTICE button with usage instructions (Follow/Lock workflow, scale/chord controls, Re-Capture/Clear).

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.2 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

reapack.name: DrumbangerDroneFX.jsfx
reapack.desc: LMS Drone FX Satellite — FET Comp + Tape Delay + Flanger

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — Audio FX satellite for DRUMBANGER. FET compressor with sidechain ducking from pad triggers, tape delay with wow/flutter and saturation in feedback, exaggerated through-zero flanger with tanh self-oscillation. Pattern grid display, waveform scope, GR meter. All in-house DSP.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Added in-plugin NOTICE button with usage instructions (sidechain/gate modes, filter/flanger/delay controls, watch pad selection).

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.2 — 4K/HiDPI scaling (gfx_ext_retina), shakebot logo, right-aligned subtitles.

reapack.name: drumbanger_load.lua
reapack.desc: DRUMBANGER: Load Sample

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — file picker to load samples onto selected pad

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Fixed pool path (DRUMBANGER instead of DrumBox16).

reapack.name: drumbanger_rescan.lua
reapack.desc: DRUMBANGER: Rescan Pool

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — trigger pool rescan from within Reaper

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Fixed pool path (DRUMBANGER instead of DrumBox16).

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.2 — Resolves symlinks to find the real pool/ directory. Fixes mismatch where Lua scripts and JSFX were reading from different pool folders on symlinked installs. Works for any install method (symlink, copy, ReaPack).

reapack.name: drumbanger_sample.lua
reapack.desc: DRUMBANGER: Sample from Project

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — sample audio from REAPER project directly into DrumBanger pads

reapack.name: drumbanger_service.lua
reapack.desc: DRUMBANGER: Sampling Service (Background)

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — background service for DrumBanger sampling integration via gmem

reapack.name: drumbanger_open_pool.lua
reapack.desc: DRUMBANGER: Open Pool Folder

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — opens the DRUMBANGER pool folder in your system file manager. Resolves symlinks to find the real pool/ directory (same one the JSFX reads from). Drop .wav files or folders of .wav files in there, then run Rescan. Works on Linux, Mac, and Windows.

reapack.name: lms_save.lua
reapack.desc: LMS: Save Session

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — snapshot all track names, fader state (vol/pan/mute/solo), and full FX chains to a named .lms file next to the project. All tracks must be named.

reapack.name: lms_load.lua
reapack.desc: LMS: Load Session

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — restore a .lms session file into the current project. Matches tracks by name, creates missing tracks. File picker opens in project folder.

reapack.name: lms_steal.lua
reapack.desc: LMS: Steal Session

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — pull the mix from any .lms file into the current project. Existing tracks get their FX chain updated; tracks not in the current project are added at the end.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Fix: File picker now starts in the project directory.

reapack.name: BLEEP_BOOP.lms
reapack.desc: LMS: Demo Session — BLEEP BOOP (Electronic)

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — electronic demo session preset for LMS save/load system. DrumBanger + drone synths + effects chain.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Added Smart Gate as first FX on Bass and Guitar audio tracks.

reapack.name: YOUR_BAND.lms
reapack.desc: LMS: Demo Session — YOUR BAND (Band Template)

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — band template demo session preset for LMS save/load system. Full band routing with LMS plugins.

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: v1.1 — Smart Gate already included on all audio tracks (added in initial release).

reapack.name: DEMO_TIME.lms
reapack.desc: LMS: Demo Session — DEMO TIME (Band + DrumBanger)

version.author: LMS
version.changelog: Initial release — YOUR BAND template with DrumBanger replacing individual drum tracks. Smart Gate on all audio tracks, Density Limiter on master.

metadata.description: LMS Plugins — Open source analog-style JSFX effects and instruments for REAPER. 10 density-aware amp sims: The Twins v2 (Fender Twin/Deluxe), The Frenchie v2 (Champ), The Basswoman v2 (Bassman), Punk Idol v2 (JCM800), Area 50/51 v2 (5150/6505), The Fridge v2 (SVT with Crushinator), Top Boost v2 (AC15), The TRSOB v2 (Mesa Triple Rectifier), The Fucking Nightmare v2 (Orange Terror Bass), OJ 99 v2 (Orange OR100). 12 shared cabinet models. Density Reverb (harmonic room physics — the room reacts to what you play). Density Limiter (predictive mastering). Density Sequencer (your playing IS the sequence). Channel strip, distressor, passive EQ, tube saturator, tape machine, tape echo, Chris' Bedroom drum room reverb, Moog-style mono synth, and the DRUMBANGER 16-pad drum machine with MIDI drone and FX drone satellites. Session templates: save/load/steal your full mixer state across projects. No subscriptions. No iLok. GPL-3.0.
